On the heels of October Prime Day, Amazon is offering hundreds of makeup, hair, and skincare deals during its annual Holiday Beauty Haul event—happening now through November 3. One standout deal our beauty editors are currently eyeing? This buzzy RoC Correxion Line Smoothing Eye Cream, now marked down to just $16.

RoC Retinol Correxion Line Smoothing Eye Cream

A dermatologist and editor favorite, this top-rated formula is also beloved by thousands of five-star reviewers and celebrities like Sarah Jessica Parker and Kim Kardashian. “A true holy grail product for keeping my under eyes smooth,” writes Parker, who is a RoC brand ambassador, of the cream in a June 2024 Instagram post. “At home, at work, and during summer travels, I’m never without it.”

Additionally, Kardashian ranked the formula among her top ten drugstore beauty products in a 2018 post on her former KKW Beauty site. “You can still find really effective skincare items without having to spend a lot of money,” she previously penned. “Just remember that consistency is key! If you use the products regularly, you’ll see better results.”

The powerhouse ingredient in this RoC cream is retinol, which dermatologist Dr. Karan Lal explains “helps fight wrinkling over time.” According to numerous studies, this particular form of Vitamin A can effectively help speed up collagen and elastin production, neutralize free radicals that can cause signs of aging, and even reduce the look of dark circles over time.
